reviews.review_text: Ive walked past this place a ton of times before, decided to try it out this time. Am I ever glad that I did!!! The service is top notch, and the food is out of this world!! Tried the roast lamb..some of the best Ive ever had!! The prices are really reasonable, too. Even the ambience is great. Cant wait to try the Sunday roast (on Sunday, obviously). This was my first time, sure wont be the last!!! (Also, drink specials are pretty amazing too!)

Great food and good service! The pizza and burgers are very tasty here. I recommend the Greek burger if you are looking for something a little different, but still really good. They have a pretty large tap list as well. Will have to come back and try a few more of their pizzas.
Went to try their breakfast menu yesterday. An absolute healthy treat to your tastebuds and mind.

A fun place to sit and hang out with friends while watching traffic on Main Street. Finding free parking as well as paid parking is difficult on Main Street with the patio dining and residential restrictions. However Summertime is here! Just walk a bit to burn off what you eat, or make way for a spot for dessert at Breka or Innocence. I love their fries! Crispy! Dippable with the ketchup on the side. I kind of wished that i ordered the first burger, but I was going to order the Greek. Instead the word bacon got to me, so as long as it had bacon, that was going to be my order. One should sit and enjoy the Main Street atmosphere using the summer. Its a different experience.

We went to The Main for a late lunch and had a most fabulous time! It has a great atmosphere and delicious food, along with daily specials that will make the place popular with locals and visitors alike. We will definitely come back if in the area again!
Had dinner at the Main and it was fantastic. I ordered the lamb souvlaki platter 10/10. Would definitely come back again. Thank you for an amazing night.

On my every visit to Vancouver going to the Main is a top priority. I totally love this place. Be the food, ambiance, their cutlery, the cocktails are amazing or a beer if you prefer, whatever the mood. The salad with hugging sauces inviting to taste their variety. Everything clean new and sparkly. Situated on the Main street, it serves a variety of fresh Greek preparations made the traditional way, also lots of finger food and Americanized deliciousness. I have tried loads of dishes on their menu, my favourite being the Gyros- wrap, tzatziki and a selection of vegetables / Feta / olives and veg exotica. Other dishes are also good. The souvlaki is excellently moist and tender through their marinating process, a perfectly grilled wonder. I always feel coming back to this place, grabbing an outdoor seating with beautiful view of the city and sumptuous meal. Finishing with an Ouzo or my favourite Tsipouro making it an other meal never to be forgotten but repeated. Highly recommended! Love, love, LOVE it!

Went for lunch today with my parents. We had pizza, souvlaki, calamari, and spanakopita. all the food was excellent, in particular the lamb skewer. They made a fresh pot of decaf coffee for my mom, and it tasted great! Even the owner came over and talked to us and made us feel special. Cheers to The Main!
I didnt try the food but the experience was really good
Had a great time at The Main. The roast lamb dinner was absolutely delicious. The sangria was also on point.  Great atmosphere,look forward to going back very soon.

Went to explore this space for an event Im planning, left this space in love with it. Shoutout to Parul for saying ALL the right things, validating my sweet tooth and creating a wonderful and fun atmosphere for us! She is an absolute gem.

I had great experience in the main restaurant. Krystal went above and beyond my expectations. She describe the ingredients of each meal with patients and big smiles. The portions of platter was so tasty and delicious. I recommend everyone to visit this restaurant with very nice people.

what a wonderful staple on Main st. I had heard lots about this place and decided to stop by with a friend, so glad I did! the menu had something for everyone and not overwhelming! the prices were very reasonable and the service by our server Cazz was fabulous; we sat in their nice patio and enjoyed the vibe of Main st and a great meal; there is something on the menu for all dietary restrictions and the portions were just right and the taste amazing; THX The Main for being a great part of Main St. ethos and offering a down-to-earth, friendly and unpretentious food hub!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much! We ll be adding vegan options soon!

reviews.review_text: Went for a few drinks on a busy weeknight Thursday. Young lady behind the bar named Mikaela was exceptional and never stopped working. She is a true asset to the venue and should be acknowledged for her amazing work ethic and positivity. The pub is great and has a good vibe with a good mixed crowd. 100% recommend.

I love an all vegetarian restaurant! Its the greatest food experience for a lifetime vegetarian! Try it all, but the burgers are great (BBQ sauce, onions...yum) and the butter chicken poutine! Delicious

Really neat place. Staff are awesome and very welcoming. Cocktails are really simple but delicious and prepared really well. Its a bit pricey but the quality in preparation and ingredients used  make it worth it. Definitely recommend checking it out. Food is also really good!
Great vibes, the bartender was very welcoming, and a pleasure to be around. Thanks Mikaela, Cazz, Layla, Raul for a great couple of beers will be back again soon.
I love this place. It s comfortable and unpretentious. Good food, good service and reasonable prices.
Good happy hour prices for beer. Good food, priced reasonably. Ambience is alright.
Unbeatable combination of atmosphere, quality and service. Been living on Main Street for awhile and has remained our favourite spot for any occasion. Souvlaki platter is my favourite!

Totally awesome lil place with a cool bar and good atmosphere. The service was friendly and great, I also enjoyed their craft beer selection wholeheartedly. The steam works glasses that tell you when its time to order another round were my fave part!
My go to lunch spot on Main Street with my coworkers. Such yummy food we all enjoy it when we come. The truffles fries are unbelievable!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much!  We enjoy when you and your friends come in!

reviews.review_text: Our waiter Mohammed was the sweetest guy around. I ordered the vegetarian pita wrap and the lavender cocktail, which was the best cocktail I ve ever had. Boyfriend ordered a burger. The food was delicious. The prices were expected and fair. Thank you!

This place is awesome   nothing elevated but right on point. I am so glad I ignored the bad reviews and tried it. It is a bit small, so depending on group size and what time u arrive u might have to wait, we got lucky as we were 3 ppl and got seated right away. Portiones are good, price is fair, quality is great, our server was amazing (feel bad I dont remember her name), she checked few times to make sure we had everything we need. All in all I will def be back.
We were there for birthday party    amazing place ..yummy food, excellent drinks.
Really Nice Restaurant with very kind service and tasty veggie food..love the pizza  .
Great food and great service. Brought my kids and they enjoyed it as well
Really great happy hour drink deals and solid food to accompany it. Was very satisfied here
I had a excellent lunch at The Main definitely recommend the Baja Fish Tacos for a lunch treat Food
Cool food. Crispy chips. Nice burger. Good value
Great little watering hole. Good selection of beer and a few ciders.  Excellent sharing plates. Very much enjoyed the eggplant fritters Staff friendly
Food was delicious. Deep fry eggplant was surprisingly good!! Plus good deals on happy hour menu

My first time at The Main today and Im already planning to go back again  soon. I had the Greek Chicken Tacos with a side of rice and it was a fantastic meal. Our server was so wonderful and friendly. The food came out fresh, HOT and full of flavour which I love!! Ill be back soon.

Another old hanger onner restaurant pub that works because they stay consistently unique.Our burgers were handmade pattie it looked like and delicious. Tuesday $5beer just sealed in the goodness. Thursday $5beer as well, ALL craft! Go there, its swell.
Super Sweet Restaurant with very kind service and tasty veggie food!

Great service and late night eats. The zucchini and eggplant chips were so perfectly thin and the tzatziki was so delicious I ordered extra. Wouldn t write home about the eggplant dip though  The lavender gin cocktail was so refreshing and I don t even like gin! Hope they eventually do live music again too and then it ll be my fave spot.
Really fun place ,food ,service perfect    see you soon.
Cozy coffee shop with indoor outdoor seating.  Bohemian vintage moto distressed urban vibe.  Great stop to read a paper and soak up the main street energy.
Nice, cozy bar with good service and well-tasting drinks and cocktails. Friendly staff
Staff is super nice and helpful, and the food is great value and great quality. We come here often with our kids and have never been disappointed
Great place to have some quick beers . Quick service , Nice Roadside Patio n indoor sitting , Neat and clean place, Small and easy menu for food . Try guys

Was walking down street and popped in for late lunch/early dinner.  Atmosphere is hip and reminds me more of a sports bar and not the traditional Greek restaurant with scenes of Greece and blue everywhere.  The food is 100% legit.  I had the chicken and lime souvlaki and it was bang on.  Lots of lemon, not overdone and the rice? Dang. 100% would do again.
Sunny, outside patio, was amazing. The weathers not as good now definitely keep on the radar. Been around for years and food is always amazing. Even better if you catch happy hour.
Lovely food, great service    highly recommended

Too good!!!! We found this gem while walking around  SERVER was so good to us, we took our time to choose our drink and she kept on checking on us without rushing us. when we ordered the nachos we thought it s expensive but you ll be surprised how big that platter is!!!! Loved the place and food drinks. Will definitely visit again

Really awesome spot for food and shared plates. Happy hour is awesome! Great staff and service was super on point. Not crazy expensive for the value here. If youre looking for a chill spot with some great vibes definitely check it out!
The food was delicious and the portions were big! I want to come back to try their other dishes.

This place is awesome. The food is great the price is even better here and the staff is amazing. I found this place by pure luck and it s now my all time favorite spot just the experience alone is worth it s weight in gold

The best bar in my neighborhood.  If youre a margarita lover, youll love this place!  The prices are normal, the food is incredibly delicious!  The staff are very friendly, I enjoy going very much.  Definitely recommend, of course patio!!!

Fish tacos were amazing. We brought a baby who knocked over multiple things, including one beer that was replaced for free. Owe it all to the amazing waiter, Id go back just for him!! Also dog friendly!

Myself and 2 girlfriends were having a night out. It seemed like a typical Friday night, very busy. Parking in the street was a bit of an issue as there is no free parking but since it was nearly 10pm, (the cut off time for the timed meters) I parked at one and paid 15 cents for 7 mins. We were greeted promptly after we entered the place and were asked to seat ourselves. It felt really nice to be acknowledged so fast especially when they were that busy. This wasnt my first time visiting and I have not had  bad experience as of yet. I always enjoyed their Greek American fusion style food. But this night I only ordered drinks. Despite the fact that they were a restaurant, they did not pressure me into buying food also. This was a plus for me. The server was very rugged looking, the only thing about this was there was no set uniform for the servers and it made it difficult to tell if the server was a server or patron. The drinks we got were amazing, they were out of a particular vodka for my mixed drink but the server expertly explained to me what other options for vodka were available my drink was still very good and a pretty hue of purple whereas normally it wont be. Overall, a very good experience, will definitely visit again.

Really good food. Greek based, I want to try them all! Theres a lot of restaurants on the Main Street strip, but this is definitely one to check out! The service was wonderful,  smiling, full of positive energy! And maybe just because it was Tuesday, every beer on tap was four bucks! Has a street patio too.
best cutest restaurant ever! so cozy and warm - the environment and the staff. delicious food and drink. so cheerful. will be back. cant wait.

I was at the Main on Main Restaurant and on every occasion the service there gets better and better. My colleagues and I ordered drinks from the bartender Noor and it was to perfection We we re all impressed.  Great job Noor you nailed it. Extremely excited that you are a great asset to the Main.
Great spot on Main St for a beer and/or food! Big selection of beers on tap. Food was amazing, big portions but super delicious. Staff so friendly and attentive. Thank you!

was here last night and must say was pleasantly surprised having read some previous reviews. service was spot on. i had the main deluxe burger and it was grilled perfectly with a warm bun (brioche i think). Girlfriend had the santorini vegetarian pizza and it was ridiculously good! Will be back for sure. Good job The Main!
Good food at decent price, liked the variety of beer on tap and atmosphere. Looks like a good place to go with a group of friends

Ive been here a few times now and consistently Ive recieved top notch service. Im a fan of their wraps and recently had Alex as a server. She recommended adding feta on their lamb wrap and, once my stay tipped into happy hour- was sure to inform me of their timely discounts. As an newcomer to Vancouver, I highly recommend this super under rated gem!
We had a great time. They set up for a party of 12. Some had burgers and some had Greek and there were no complaints.
Lovely neighborhood pub, cosy booths for people watching and lots of sports on the walls. Happy hour from 3 to 6.
NAT was my waitress I love her. Grace made this night amazing
Went here for lunch, the server was very friendly. The food was quite tasty, the restaurant has a great ambiance. Great place for lunch or dinner on main Street

Quaint decor. Nice, casual and comfortable restaurant with well priced food. Lamb soulaki was excellent as was the calamari and the cauliflower bites. Pleasant staff. Will be going back when Im in the neighborhood.
Great value for what you get to eat. Lovely atmosphere but is a small space so try to plan ahead.

Every time that I come here. The staff is friendly and make me feel welcome, they have the best attitude to costumers and that it is great, the food it is even better, because the food have almost the same taste of food cook in Greece. If you looking for a place to feel welcome and dont be desapoint on the food, main is the correct spot. I laugh went the bill come to my table because the teste of the food and the customer service was amazing. I tough they charge me less of what they suppose to. This place is the best. Enjoy it.

We were up in Vancouver over the summer on vacation. We found this place and ended up visiting twice before we left. They have a large selection of choices. Everything from pizza to burgers. They had a nice craft beer selection too. We found the wait staff to be polite and professional and our order was brought out in a timely fashion, both times we went there to eat. Very happy, I recommend this place!

We return to the Main on a regular basis because of its consistency of service and food. The waitstaff are overall pleasant and friendly, the food is nothing amazing but consistent (which is important after a long day or when in a hurry!), and weve never been denied a seat even when the place appears to be full. The Main is our default go-to restaurant; Ive never found any reason to complain, and will continue to return on a regular basis.
Sunday night steak dinner special was amazing! Phantom beer on tap was fantastic. There is no kids menu so I ended up eating the kids dinner the next day but it was still good.

Came in in a whim, ordered food to take out while I waited at the bar with a gin and tonic served in a beautiful heavy glass. The food was great and the company at the bar (both customers and staff) was even more so. Ill definitely be heading back to enjoy a full evening here.

The Maine is always a great experience even when its busy. I find the music to always be a little too loud to properly have a conversation (and Im 23 so Im used to loud music). Its not REALLY loud but should be just a bit quieter. The pizza here is great.
Excellent pizza and excellent beer 10/10 would eat here again.
Exceptional cocktails! The bartender was really nice and friendly too! Will definitely go back another day.
Cool food.  Crispy chips.  Nice burger.  Good value

Great time! Good value! Cant wait to go back! We went for the afternoon happy hour. Our server, Alaska, was fun and attentive. The atmosphere was busy and upbeat, but quiet enough for us to speak normally. The decor was cozy, attractive and clean. The Happy Fish Tacos were delicious, with a sweet but tasty sauce. Although we found the Happy Calamari a bit bland, we quite enjoyed the Happy Truffle Fries. At the end of our very pleasant afternoon, the bill was a nice surprise. Were happy to have discovered The Main on Main Street!
Alaska is amazing! Random visit with a buddy and she made the experience a great experience. Will visit again. She has the greatest beer advice and can trust her to pick your beers all night!

I have always liked The Main since my first visit many years ago to celebrate a friends birthday. When I tried the roast lamb dinner, I found a new favorite, sorry no photos I ate the lamb and forgot.
I had a burger and beer. It was quite tasty and very reasonably priced. The girls serving were very friendly and made you feel at home.
Happy hour even on weekends, nuff said! A big cheery space with lots of drink and food options. The local house lager is $3.75 for a sleeve on special, hard to beat that =)
Great atmosphere, good brews in tap, tasty food.  If you are looking for a funky community type pub, you cant go wrong with The Main
Picked up two lamb cabobs for lunch to go. Very tasty. Great portions with sziki and pita bread.  Will be back
When the food arrived at our table, I thought there was way too much food for us to eat.  However, everything was delicious and we cleaned our plates including appetizers.  Well be back!
Ordered takeout last night! Everything was super good and packed nicely! People working there were very nice! I will be back!
I enjoy this place! Funky, chill, easy going vibe with great food, great Happy hour and great service! Definitely worth checking out!
This place has the best happy hour specials - shout out to the amazing calamari! Really solid place, always worth a visit if you re in the mood for a snack!

Had dinner here Friday night with my husband. He had chicken souvlaki, I had a pizza. Both were tasty (although my husband complained about the metal tray his food came on, it kept sliding all over the wooden table). The real highlight of our visit was the girl who greeted and served us, Jalicia. Friendly, personable, and so attentive, she really made our evening. We were never without water or coffee, and checked back often to see if we needed anything. Wow! I am so used to lackadaisical servers who take your order, serve it, and thats it. No customer service, no refills, no smile - in other words, crappy service. What a refreshing change at The Main. Jalicia was everything a server could be and more. Shes a gem! Thanks for helping us really enjoy our evening out
Had a great experience during our first visit here. Excellent (and well priced) food, friendly attentive and fast service. Will definitely be coming back.
Great food friendly service. The cheaper of the 2 nachos was too basic, wouldn t order again. The wraps were really good tho and a great Manhattan.
Randomly went here after a recommendation from a hostess from another bar. Really loved the Tuscan nachos and the cocktails were solid. I would go back!
Greek pitta wraps and pizza was decent. Server was super nice and Tuesday night had $4 on all draught beer
Rob is a fantastic bartender who made my birthday especially fun. Maddy was an incredibly sweet host & had great recommendations. Nachos were great!

I went here for a couple hours on Super Bowl Sunday of 2021 and it wasn t too packed, as it was definitely covid safe! Really sweet and jolly staff who make you very comfortable and sure that you get everything you ask for while dining. Comfy atmosphere for a night out w the guys/girls, a couple beers with appies, or even date night! ALSO! Pretty and unique cocktails! i recommend the truffle fries... their to dieeee for and $5 during happy hour! 10/10
Laid back ambience with friendly efficient table service.  Located on a rapidly improving dining/bar/coffee hangout scene.  The Main is definitely worth seeking out!

It was our friends birthday and we diceded to keep the night going at their bar. Service was excellent and they werent rushing us to leave the place when they were closing down, In fact they told us to take our time hahaha. Really nice servers and well informed about their stuff.  Definitley will come back
We had a few drinks here. Everything was great: vibe, service, the drinks. I especially liked the Plum Sour.
Warm, comfortable environment with friendly staff. Mediteranian food with a pub feel. The slow roasted lamb and chicken skewers were  beyond fantastic!!
Yum! Super duper kind staff
The Main is an awesome local haunt. Fantastic cocktails and service, especially if you re sitting at the bar and Lindsay, their bar manager, is working.
Chill and accommodating staff, great prices. Never tried the food but everything is so genuine in this place Im sure its awesome. A great Vancouver hidden gem!
Cazz was an absolute delight and we will be back.
The food is quite tasty. Love their Main burger
